product_name: Clement Strada LGG Foldable Tire - 700 x 23 / 25 / 28
long_description: The Clement Strada LGG clincher road bike tire offers good grip and long-lasting wear for everyday riding and training on the road. Slightly textured center tread with chevron pattern on the shoulders provides grip on both wet and dry roads. Puncture-resistant belting under the tread helps protect you from flats. Folding bead; 60 tpi casing.
short_description: The Clement Strada LGG clincher road bike tire offers good grip and long-lasting wear for everyday riding and training on the road.
